title: From Waiting Tables To Building A $4 Trillion Giant: Meet Jensen Huang, The AI Billionaire Worth Rs 9.91 Lakh Crore, And 7 Other Tech Titans Shaping The Future
description: Artificial Intelligence has created a new league of billionaires, from chipmakers to gaming innovators. Nvidia’s Jensen Huang tops the list with Rs 9.91 lakh crore, after once working as a waiter. Alongside him are young prodigy Alexandr Wang, OpenAI’s Sam Altman, and others who turned algorithms into billion-dollar empires. Meet the seven richest AI billionaires shaping tomorrow. , People, Times Now
content:
Top 7 Richest AI Billionaires in the World: The Incredible Stories Behind Fortune Makers Like Jensen Huang, Alexandr Wang, and Dario Amodei

title: ChatGPT to get parental controls after teen's death
description: PARIS, France — American artificial intelligence firm OpenAI said Tuesday it would add parental controls to its chatbot ChatGPT, a week after an American couple said the system encouraged their teenaged son to kill himself.
content:

title: Salesforce CEO confirms 4,000 layoffs ‘because I need less heads’ with AI
description: Salesforce has cut 4,000 of its customer support roles, CEO Marc Benioff recently said while discussing how artificial intelligence has helped reduce the company headcount
content:

title: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff says tech giant cut 4,000 support roles because of AI
description: Artificial intelligence already is replacing certain jobs at technology companies.
content:

title: Trump says White House window video is AI. His team indicated it's real
description: President Donald Trump said a video circulating online that showed items being tossed out of an upstairs window of the White House was created with artificial intelligence, despite his press team seeming to confirm the veracity of it hours earlier.
content:
By MICHELLE L. PRICE, Associated Press
